content.raw:
The drcsim robot models that are used by gazebo reside in drcsim/models/drc_robot*/model.urdf

The xacro scripts used to create drc_robot_sandia_hand use drcsim/ros/drc_robot_utils/urdf/drc_robot.urdf, but this appears to be updated less frequently than the model used by gazebo.

When we make changes to the gazebo model, we also need to make changes to the urdf in the ros directory. Even better would be to automatically build the gazebo model from the source urdf so there's only one model in version control. In the meantime, please attempt to update both models.
content.html:
The drcsim robot models that are used by gazebo reside in drcsim/models/drc_robot*/model.urdf

The xacro scripts used to create drc_robot_sandia_hand use drcsim/ros/drc_robot_utils/urdf/drc_robot.urdf, but this appears to be updated less frequently than the model used by gazebo.

When we make changes to the gazebo model, we also need to make changes to the urdf in the ros directory. Even better would be to automatically build the gazebo model from the source urdf so there's only one model in version control. In the meantime, please attempt to update both models.
